No."}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "hearing_date_time", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Date and Time"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "venue", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Venue"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "nta_charges", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Charges", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "indiv_charge", "print_width": "100%", "print_hide": 0}]}, {"fieldname": "employee_rights", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Employee Rights", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "individual_right", "print_width": "100%", "print_hide": 0}]}, {"fieldname": "disciplinary_history", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Disciplinary History:", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "date", "print_width": "15%", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "charges", "print_width": "70%", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "sanction", "print_width": "15%", "print_hide": 0}]}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

The Employee, by their signature below, confirms that the contents of the Notice to Attend were explained to them in a form and language which they understand.

name: NTA Hearing
